results.overview: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.
results.title: Rocky IV

results.original_title: Rocky IV : Le Coup de poing américain
results.overview: Rocky IV is dually symbolic - it embodies both the victory of the American boxer over the Soviet one and the victory of neo-liberalism over a dwindling socialism. Today, Rocky is held up as a model by some and is a subject of derision for others. An emblem of the 1980s, its culture and its heroes, the film will be the subject of an entertaining analysis of popular culture.
results.title: Rocky IV: The American Punch

results.original_title: Rocky IV: Rocky vs. Drago - The Ultimate Director's Cut
results.title: Rocky IV: Rocky vs. Drago - The Ultimate Director's Cut

results.overview: A philipine parody of the Rocky Saga about Rocky Tan-go, a pour man with a golden heart.
results.title: Johny Rocky Tan-Go Part IV
